5249272462913321422.Text: Dwemer centurions are enchanted war devices in the form of animated metal creatures. There are three classes of Dwemer centurions: the centurion spider, the centurion sphere, and the steam centurion. These devices are rarely encountered outside of ancient Dwemer ruins.
